name: Internal Consistency Rules for Policy Documents
description: Rules to identify contradictions and inconsistencies within policy documents

rules.description: Check for contradictory statements about work hours
rules.suggestion: Ensure work hour requirements are consistent throughout the document.
Use consistent terminology when referring to organizational units.
Use consistent date format throughout the document (e.g., MM/DD/YYYY or Month DD, YYYY).
Resolve conflicts between mandatory and optional requirements.
Verify all contact information is current and consistently formatted.

rules.description: Check for consistent approval authority references
rules.suggestion: Ensure approval authority levels are consistently defined and referenced.

rules.description: Check for logical sequence in procedure steps
rules.suggestion: Ensure procedure steps follow a logical sequence and are clearly numbered.
